definition: The study and application of scientific knowledge and methods for practical purposes, especially in industry and engineering. It encompasses the development, implementation, and utilization of various tools, techniques, and processes to solve problems and improve efficiency in various fields. This term is commonly used to refer to the overall field of knowledge and practices related to advancements in science, engineering, and industry.

examples.german: Technologie ist der Einsatz von Wissen und Werkzeugen zur Lösung von Problemen.
examples.english: Technology is the use of knowledge and tools to solve problems.

examples.german: Die moderne Technologie hat unser Leben in vielerlei Hinsicht verbessert.
examples.english: Modern technology has improved our lives in many ways.

examples.german: Die Informationstechnologie spielt eine wichtige Rolle in der heutigen Gesellschaft.
examples.english: Information technology plays an important role in today's society.

examples.german: Die Technologie entwickelt sich ständig weiter und bringt neue Innovationen hervor.
examples.english: Technology is constantly evolving and bringing forth new innovations.

examples.german: Die Automobilindustrie setzt zunehmend auf umweltfreundliche Technologien.
examples.english: The automotive industry is increasingly relying on environmentally friendly technologies.
